hero.title: Qwen Image Layered
hero.description: Convert flat images into editable, transparent assets for Figma, Photoshop, and motion design in one click.

branding.title: Trusted by creators using modern stacks

introduce.name: introduce
introduce.title: A layered workspace for modern creators
introduce.label: How it works
introduce.description: Qwen Image Layered separates a flat image into independent layers you can edit, animate, and remix.

items.title: Upload a single image
items.description: Start with JPG, PNG, or WebP and let the model analyze the scene.

items.title: Guide the separation
items.description: Pick 2-8 layers and add a short prompt to steer what gets isolated.

items.title: Export layers
items.description: Download transparent PNG/WebP assets ready for design tools.

benefit.name: benefit
benefit.title: The New Standard for Image Editing
benefit.label: Benefits
benefit.description: Stop fighting with pixels. Get structured, editable assets instantly.

items.title: Semantic Layer Separation
items.description: Intelligently identifies and isolates distinct elements—text, objects, and backgrounds—into independent, pixel-perfect layers.

items.title: Smart Background Inpainting
items.description: Automatically generates hidden details behind objects, ensuring every layer is complete and ready for animation or repositioning.

items.title: Transparent exports
items.description: Download PNG or WebP layers with alpha for production use.

benefit_showcase.name: benefit_showcase
benefit_showcase.label: Layered examples
benefit_showcase.title: See layered separation in action
benefit_showcase.description: Original images split into clean foreground and background assets.

items.title: Product photos
items.description: Create clean cutouts and reusable backdrops for catalogs.

items.title: Screenshots & UI
items.description: Get layers you can animate or replace without redoing masks.

items.title: What file types can I upload?
items.description: JPG, PNG, and WebP up to 10MB.

items.title: How many layers can I generate?
items.description: Choose 2-8 layers per image with the layer slider.

items.title: What output formats are supported?
items.description: Download each layer as transparent PNG or WebP.

items.title: Are my uploads stored?
items.description: Uploads and results are stored so you can preview and download them. See the Privacy Policy for details.

items.title: Can I control what gets separated?
items.description: Yes, add a short prompt (e.g., "subject, props, background") to guide separation.

items.title: Is it free?
items.description: Core features are free; higher resolutions and premium options may require a plan.
